## Alt text does not work with urls

```
![look a puffin](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/94/Puffin_Mrkoww.jpg "Is this alt text?: A proper puffin")
```

![look a puffin](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/94/Puffin_Mrkoww.jpg "Is this alt text?: A proper puffin")

---

## Alt text does not work with local images either

```
![look a puffin](../images/Puffin_Mrkoww.jpg "Is this alt text?: A proper puffin")
```

![look a puffin](../images/Puffin_Mrkoww.jpg "Is this alt text?: A proper puffin")
